name: places/ChIJIRh79E1ZwokRsQKKwYgx0z8
formattedAddress: 1727 Broadway 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1727 Broadway 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Bhatti is the worst healthcare provider I have ever seen. At the time, he was the only dermatologist who would take my insurance so I had to see him twice. The first visit, he was very alarmed about a mark on my face, told me it could be cancerous (I was 23 years old), immediately scraped it, and left while in the middle of answering a question I had about the wound. He left to avoid answering more questions. The nurse then told me not to be too concerned and I was told to check out at the front desk.

In my second visit, I told him I was very nervous about issues with ear piercings. He looked at them and then took out a syringe without saying anything. I asked, "what are you going to do with that?" and he replied, "we don't ask questions here." It was an absolutely terrifying experience and made me feel unheard and unsafe, especially as a young woman.

Following that appointment, I left a negative score in the survey. The office manager reached out and asked to discuss the rating. I said I would be happy to discuss and the manager never responded. Dr. Bhatti and Schweiger dermatology are disrespectful and do not care about patients. Avoid at all costs.

originalText.text: Very unprofessional. For the third time, I had to wait more than thirty minutes to meet the doctor, and every time the consultation would last less than 5 minutes. I feel all my appointments were rushed, with no assistance and professional review.

text.text: Very unprofessional. For the third time, I had to wait more than thirty minutes to meet the doctor, and every time the consultation would last less than 5 minutes. I feel all my appointments were rushed, with no assistance and professional review.

originalText.text: I was seen to by Dr Bhatti and he’s wonderful. He has a wonderful bedside manner. He was very thorough in making sure I was comfortable and that I understood the procedure. I would totally recommend him. Thank you, Dr Bhatti.

text.text: I was seen to by Dr Bhatti and he’s wonderful. He has a wonderful bedside manner. He was very thorough in making sure I was comfortable and that I understood the procedure. I would totally recommend him. Thank you, Dr Bhatti.

originalText.text: I know Dr Bhatti to be an outstanding mohs surgeon who really cares about his patients and I'd happily trust friends or family to his care and expertise.
